main_definition: A long, narrow strip of fabric or material often used for decoration, tying gifts, or marking winners in competitions.

meanings_and_examples.example: She tied a red ribbon to the gift box.
The blue ribbon at the fair was awarded to the best pie contestant.
He used a bright pink ribbon to tie his hair in place.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Strips of fabric used on clothing
meanings_and_examples.example: The shirt had intricate patterns made with different colored ribbons sewn onto it.
